name: Tour Poster Photoshoot 2024
about: Poster series exploring light, texture, and negative space for a fictional tour campaign. Focus on simple forms, controlled contrast, and a cinematic atmosphere.

name: Zena Identity
about: Clean, minimal identity built around flowing shapes and carefully balanced curves. Focus on a tactile, reflective feel that works both in print and digital.

name: AERV Cover Series
about: A series of abstract covers combining typographic rhythm with subtle grain and gradients. Built to work across multiple formats and devices.

name: AEC3 Mark
about: Monoline logomark designed as a continuous loop. The form is intentionally minimal while still retaining a strong, memorable silhouette.

name: Orbis Libri Logo
about: Visual identity concept for a fictional publishing house. The logo focuses on circular motion and the rhythm of reading, expressed through simple geometric forms.

name: Reborn Poster
about: Poster exploring rebirth and transformation through layered textures, grain, and bold typography. Built for both large-format print and digital use.
